00047 /*
00048  * The information for each marker in the annotation file.
00049  */
00050 typedef struct _AnnotationEntryType
00051 {
00052         string name;
00053         string rsId;
00054         int pos;
00055         char chr;
00056         char alleleA;
00057         char alleleB;
00058         int operator<(const _AnnotationEntryType &rhs) const
00059         {
00060                 if (chr == rhs.chr)
00061                         return (pos < rhs.pos);
00062                 else
00063                         return (chr < rhs.chr);
00064         }
00065 } AnnotationEntryType;
00066 
00067 /*
00068  * Compliments the base call
00069  */
00070 static char Compliment(char call)
00071 {
00072         if (call == 'a')
00073                 return 't';
00074         else if (call == 'A')
00075                 return 'T';
00076         else if (call == 'c')
00077                 return 'g';
00078         else if (call == 'C')
00079                 return 'G';
00080         else if (call == 'g')
00081                 return 'c';
00082         else if (call == 'G')
00083                 return 'C';
00084         else if (call == 't')
00085                 return 'a';
00086         else if (call == 'T')
00087                 return 'A';
00088         return 'N';
00089 }

00091 /*
00092  * Convert pointer
00093  */
00094 ExportImputeFormatEngine * ExportImputeFormatEngine::FromBase(BaseEngine *engine)
00095 {
00096         if (engine != NULL && engine->getEngineName() == ExportImputeFormatEngine::EngineName())
00097                 return (ExportImputeFormatEngine *)engine;
00098         return NULL;
00099 }

00116 /*
00117  * Defines the options for the engine.
00118  */
00119 void ExportImputeFormatEngine::defineOptions()
00120 {
00121         defineOption("t", "txt-files", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00122                 "Text file specifying input TXT files to process.",
00123                 "");
00124         defOptMult("", "files", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00125                 "The text files to process.",
00126         "");
00127         defineOption("a", "annotation-file", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00128                 "The annotation file name.",
00129                 "");
00130 }

00137 /**
00138  * Make sure that our options are sane. Call Err::errAbort if not.
00139  */
00140 void ExportImputeFormatEngine::checkOptionsImp()
00141 {
00142     defineStates();
00143 
00144         string file = getOpt("annotation-file");
00145         if (file.empty() == true)
00146                 Err::errAbort("Must specify an annotation file.");
00147 
00148         file = getOpt("txt-files");
00149         vector<string> files;
00150         if (file.empty() == false)
00151         {
00152                 affx::TsvFile tsv;
00153 #ifdef WIN32
00154                 tsv.m_optEscapeOk = false;
00155 #endif
00156                 string txtFile;
00157                 tsv.bind(0, "file", &txtFile, TSV_BIND_REQUIRED);
00158                 try 
00159                 {
00160                         if(tsv.open(file) != TSV_OK)
00161                         {
00162                                 Err::errAbort("Couldn't open file: " + file);
00163                         }
00164                 }
00165                 catch (Except&)
00166                 {
00167                         tsv.close();    // need to close the file
00168                         throw;
00169                 }
00170                 tsv.rewind();
00171                 while(tsv.nextLevel(0) == TSV_OK) {
00172                         files.push_back(txtFile);
00173                 }
00174                 tsv.close();
00175                 Verbose::out(1, "Read " + ToStr(files.size()) + " files from: " + Fs::basename(file));
00176         }
00177         else
00178         {
00179                 files = getOptVector("files");
00180         }
00181         setOpt("files",files);
00182 }
00183 
00184 /*
00185  * Convert the chromosome string to an integer.
00186  */
00187 static char ChrToInt(const string &chr)
00188 {
00189         if (chr == "X")
00190                 return 125;
00191         else if (chr == "Y")
00192                 return 126;
00193         else if (chr == "MT")
00194                 return 127;
00195         else
00196                 return atoi(chr.c_str());
00197 }
00198 
00199 static string IntToChr(char c)
00200 {
00201         if (c == 125)
00202                 return "X";
00203         else if (c == 126)
00204                 return "Y";
00205         else if (c == 127)
00206                 return "MT";
00207         else
00208         {
00209                 char buf[10];
00210                 sprintf(buf, "%d", (int) c);
00211                 return buf;
00212         }
00213 }
00214 
00215 /*
00216  * Cache the annotations in a sorted list.
00217  */
00218 static list<AnnotationEntryType> CacheAnnotations(const string &annotationFileName)
00219 {
00220         TsvFile tsv;
00221         if (tsv.open(annotationFileName) != TSV_OK)
00222                 Err::errAbort("Unable to open the TSV file");
00223 
00224         list<AnnotationEntryType> annotations;
00225         string chr;
00226         string strand;
00227         string alleleA;
00228         string alleleB;
00229         string position;
00230         AnnotationEntryType entry;
00231         tsv.bind(0, "Probe Set ID", &entry.name, TSV_BIND_REQUIRED);
00232         tsv.bind(0, "dbSNP RS ID", &entry.rsId, TSV_BIND_REQUIRED);
00233         tsv.bind(0, "Chromosome", &chr, TSV_BIND_REQUIRED);
00234         tsv.bind(0, "Physical Position", &position, TSV_BIND_REQUIRED);
00235         tsv.bind(0, "Strand", &strand, TSV_BIND_REQUIRED);
00236         tsv.bind(0, "Allele A", &alleleA, TSV_BIND_REQUIRED);
00237         tsv.bind(0, "Allele B", &alleleB, TSV_BIND_REQUIRED);
00238         while (tsv.nextLine() == TSV_OK)
00239         {
00240                 if (position.empty() == true)
00241                         continue;
00242                 if (position[0] == '-')
00243                         continue;
00244 
00245                 entry.pos = getInt(position);
00246                 entry.chr = ChrToInt(chr);
00247                 entry.alleleA = alleleA[0];
00248                 entry.alleleB = alleleB[0];
00249                 if (strand == "-")
00250                 {
00251                         entry.alleleA = Compliment(entry.alleleA);
00252                         entry.alleleB = Compliment(entry.alleleB);
00253                 }
00254                 annotations.push_back(entry);
00255         }
00256         tsv.close();
00257         annotations.sort();
00258         return annotations;
00259 }
00260 
00261 /*
00262  * Create a mapping of probe set id to line number.
00263  */
00264 static map<string, linenum_t> CacheMarkerPositions(TsvFile &tsv)
00265 {
00266         map<string, linenum_t> positions;
00267         string name;
00268         tsv.bind(0, PROBE_SET_ID_COL_NAME, &name, TSV_BIND_REQUIRED);
00269         while (tsv.nextLine() == TSV_OK)
00270         {
00271                 if (positions.find(name) == positions.end())
00272                         positions[name] = tsv.lineNum();
00273         }
00274         tsv.unbindAll();
00275         tsv.rewind();
00276         return positions;
00277 }
00278 
00279 /*
00280  * Merge the annotation and data in the IMPUTE format.
00281  */
00282 static void MergeAndExportData(const string &outputFileBaseName, TsvFile &callTsv, TsvFile &confTsv, map<string, linenum_t> &namePositions, const list<AnnotationEntryType> &annotations)
00283 {
00284         string name;
00285         u_int8_t lastChr = -1;
00286         ofstream out;
00287         int nDataCols;
00288         vector<string> calls;
00289         vector<float> confidences;
00290         bool includeConfScores = (confTsv.is_open() == 1);
00291 
00292         // Bind the columns in the data file
00293         nDataCols = callTsv.getColumnCount(0) - 1;
00294         calls.resize(nDataCols);
00295         callTsv.bind(0, 0, &name, TSV_BIND_REQUIRED);
00296         for (int i=0; i<nDataCols; i++)
00297                 callTsv.bind(0, i+1, &calls[i],  TSV_BIND_REQUIRED);
00298         if (includeConfScores == true)
00299         {
00300                 if (nDataCols != confTsv.getColumnCount(0) - 1)
00301                         Err::errAbort("There is a mismatch in the number of columns in the confidence and call files.");
00302                 confidences.resize(nDataCols);
00303                 for (int i=0; i<nDataCols; i++)
00304                         confTsv.bind(0, i+1, &confidences[i],  TSV_BIND_REQUIRED);
00305         }
00306 
00307         // Go through the annotations, find the data and export the results
00308         for (list<AnnotationEntryType>::const_iterator annotIt=annotations.begin(); annotIt!=annotations.end(); annotIt++)
00309         {
00310                 // Get the next annotation (this is in sorted order)
00311                 const AnnotationEntryType &annot = *annotIt;
00312                 if (namePositions.find(annot.name) == namePositions.end())
00313                         continue;
00314 
00315                 // Go to the associated data line
00316                 linenum_t line = namePositions[annot.name];
00317                 callTsv.seekLine(line - 1);
00318                 callTsv.nextLine();
00319                 assert(name == annot.name);
00320                 if (includeConfScores == true)
00321                 {
00322                         confTsv.seekLine(line - 1);
00323                         confTsv.nextLine();
00324                 }
00325 
00326                 // Create a new file for each chromosome
00327                 if (out.is_open() == false || lastChr != annot.chr)
00328                 {
00329                         if (out.is_open() == true)
00330                                 out.close();
00331                         string fileName = outputFileBaseName + string("chr") + IntToChr(annot.chr) + string(".txt");
00332                         if (FileUtils::Exists(fileName.c_str()) == true)
00333                                 out.open(fileName.c_str(), ios::out | ios::app);
00334                         else
00335                                 out.open(fileName.c_str(), ios::out);
00336                         if (!out)
00337                                 Err::errAbort("Unable to create the output file: " + fileName);
00338                         lastChr = annot.chr;
00339                 }
00340 
00341                 // Output the annotation information.
00342                 out << name << " " // probe set name
00343                         << annot.rsId << " " // rs ID
00344                         << annot.pos << " " // position
00345                         << annot.alleleA << " " // Allele A
00346                         << annot.alleleB << " "; // Allele B
00347 
00348                 // Output the genotype calls
00349                 for (int i=0; i<nDataCols; i++)
00350                 {
00351                         if (calls[i] == "AA" || calls[i] == "A" || calls[i] == "0")
00352                         {
00353                                 if (includeConfScores == false)
00354                                         out << "1 0 0";
00355                                 else
00356                                 {
00357                                         float conf = confidences[i];
00358                                         out << 1 - conf << " " << conf << " " << "0";
00359                                 }
00360                         }
00361                         else if (calls[i] == "AB" || calls[i] == "1")
00362                         {
00363                                 if (includeConfScores == false)
00364                                         out << "0 1 0";
00365                                 else
00366                                 {
00367                                         float conf = confidences[i];
00368                                         out << 0.5f*conf << " " << 1-conf << " " << 0.5f*conf;
00369                                 }
00370                         }
00371                         else if (calls[i] == "BB" || calls[i] == "B" || calls[i] == "2")
00372                         {
00373                                 if (includeConfScores == false)
00374                                         out << "0 0 1";
00375                                 else
00376                                 {
00377                                         float conf = confidences[i];
00378                                         out << "0 " << conf << " " << 1-conf;
00379                                 }
00380                         }
00381                         else
00382                         {
00383                                 out << "0 0 0";
00384                         }
00385                         if (i < nDataCols - 1)
00386                                 out << " ";
00387                 }
00388                 out << endl;
00389         }
00390         out.close();
00391 }
00392 
00393 /*
00394  * Determine if confidence files are part of the input files.
00395  */
00396 static bool IncludeConfidences(const vector<string> &dataFileNames)
00397 {
00398         bool found = false;
00399         for (vector<string>::const_iterator fileIt=dataFileNames.begin(); fileIt!=dataFileNames.end() && found == false; fileIt++)
00400         {
00401                 string baseName = Fs::basename(*fileIt);
00402                 found = (baseName.find(".confidences.") != -1);
00403         }
00404         return found;
00405 }
00406 
00407 /*
00408  * Check the order of the input files to make sure calls and confidences are together.
00409  */
00410 static void CheckOrder(const vector<string> &dataFileNames)
00411 {
00412         if (dataFileNames.size() % 2 != 0)
00413                 Err::errAbort("There must be the same number of call and confidence files.");
00414 
00415         string callBase;
00416         string confBase;
00417         for (int i=0; i<(int)dataFileNames.size(); i++)
00418         {
00419                 string baseName = Fs::basename(dataFileNames[i]);
00420                 int idx = baseName.find(".confidences.");
00421                 if (idx != -1)
00422                         confBase = baseName.substr(0, idx);
00423                 else
00424                 {
00425                         idx = baseName.find(".calls.");
00426                         if (idx != -1)
00427                                 callBase = baseName.substr(0, idx);
00428                         else
00429                                 Err::errAbort("The input files must have either 'calls' or 'confidences' as part of the name.");
00430                 }
00431                 if (i%2 == 1)
00432                 {
00433                         if (callBase != confBase)
00434                                 Err::errAbort("The call and confidence input files must be paired together.");
00435                         callBase = "";
00436                         confBase = "";
00437                 }
00438         }
00439 }
00440 
00441 /*
00442  * This is the "main" equivalent
00443  */
00444 void ExportImputeFormatEngine::runImp()
00445 {
00446         try
00447         {
00448                 // Determine if any of the files are confidence files.
00449                 vector<string> dataFileNames = getOptVector("files");
00450                 int nloops = (int) dataFileNames.size();
00451                 bool includeConfidenceValues = IncludeConfidences(dataFileNames);
00452                 if (includeConfidenceValues == true)
00453                 {
00454                         CheckOrder(dataFileNames);
00455                         nloops /= 2;
00456                 }
00457                 Verbose::progressBegin(1, "Exporting data to the IMPUTE format", 2*nloops + 1, 0, 2*nloops + 1);
00458 
00459                 // Create a mapping of the annotations.
00460                 string annotationFileName = getOpt("annotation-file");
00461                 list<AnnotationEntryType> annotations = CacheAnnotations(annotationFileName);
00462 
00463                 // Update the progress meter
00464                 Verbose::progressStep(1);
00465 
00466                 // Export the genotypes to the IMPUTE format.
00467                 for (vector<string>::iterator fileIt=dataFileNames.begin(); fileIt!=dataFileNames.end(); fileIt++)
00468                 {
00469                         // Determine the output file base name
00470                         string callFile;
00471                         string confFile;
00472                         string outputFileBaseName;
00473                         if (includeConfidenceValues == false)
00474                         {
00475                                 callFile = *fileIt;
00476                                 outputFileBaseName = (*fileIt).substr(0, fileIt->length() - strlen(".calls.txt")) + ".impute.";
00477                         }
00478                         else
00479                         {
00480                                 if (fileIt->find(".calls.") != -1)
00481                                 {
00482                                         outputFileBaseName = (*fileIt).substr(0, fileIt->length() - strlen(".calls.txt")) + ".impute.";
00483                                         callFile = *fileIt;
00484                                         confFile = *(++fileIt);
00485                                 }
00486                                 else
00487                                 {
00488                                         outputFileBaseName = (*fileIt).substr(0, fileIt->length() - strlen(".confidences.txt")) + ".impute.";
00489                                         confFile = *fileIt;
00490                                         callFile = *(++fileIt);
00491                                 }
00492                         }
00493                         
00494 
00495                         // Open the call file and create a map of name to line number
00496                         TsvFile callTsv;
00497                         if (callTsv.open(callFile) != TSV_OK)
00498                                 Err::errAbort("Unable to open the file: " + callFile);
00499                         map<string, linenum_t> namePositions = CacheMarkerPositions(callTsv);
00500 
00501                         // Update the progress meter
00502                         Verbose::progressStep(1);
00503 
00504                         // Open the confidence file
00505                         TsvFile confTsv;
00506                         if (includeConfidenceValues == true)
00507                         {
00508                                 if (confTsv.open(confFile) != TSV_OK)
00509                                         Err::errAbort("Unable to open the file: " + confFile);
00510                         }
00511 
00512                         // Output the data
00513                         MergeAndExportData(outputFileBaseName, callTsv, confTsv, namePositions, annotations);
00514 
00515                         // Update the progress meter
00516                         Verbose::progressStep(1);
00517                 }
00518                 Verbose::progressEnd(1, "The data have been exported.");
00519         }
00520     catch(const Except &e)
00521         {
00522                 Err::errAbort(e.what());
00523     }
00524     catch(const std::bad_alloc &e)
00525         {
00526                 Err::errAbort(e.what());
00527     }
00528     catch(const std::exception &e)
00529         {
00530                 Err::errAbort(e.what());
00531     }
00532         catch (...)
00533         {
00534                 Err::errAbort("Unknown error.");
00535         }
00536 }
